title: Booing passengers shocked as woman is booted from plane
text:
Booing passengers shocked as woman is booted from plane MICHAEL DALY Last updated 10:36, October 15 2015 
Passengers were left horrified after a crying woman was kicked off an American Airlines flight, for no apparent reason. 
Video captured the moment Tiana Fough was reduced to tears when a flight attendant demanded she left the plane as Fough cried, "You're so mean to me. I didn't do anything." 
According to Portland tv station KATU , that incident began when a flight attendant told her to "step aside". Rodger Mallison 
The incident looks like looks like being a PR catastrophe for American Airlines. 
"I was boarding the plane with the other passengers. There were about three people in front of me. I was chatting with the lady in front of me." Fough told the news station. 
She didn't realise she was being asked to do something. "He did not have my eye contact. He didn't have my attention. I didn't even hear him until he started yelling at me." 
That flight attendant then threatened to order her off the plane. 
Tiana Fough: Footage shows her being kicked off a flight to the protests of other passengers. Image: KATU 
"He said, 'Do you want to take the next flight? I can kick you off this plane right now." 
She continued to her seat, where she told another flight attendant about the exchange. 
The attendant who yelled at her at the front of the plane then showed up at her seat, Fough said. Ad Feedback 
"He opened up the overhead compartments and said, 'Where's your stuff? You're getting off this plane right now,'" Fough said. 
In the video a female flight attendant can be heard saying: "I need to have you come off the aircraft. 
Fough, who appeared to have been sitting quietly in the seat, can be heard starting to sob. "You're so mean to me. I didn't do anything." 
"No, that's enough," a woman says in a harsh voice, while another passenger asks, "are you serious"? 
"I didn't even know he was talking to me," Fough says. "This can't be legal." 
Bill Byrne, who took the footage, showing how the incident unfolded. Image: KATU 
Protests from other passengers grew louder, with one man saying, "that's the last time I fly American". 
"You just lost a lot of customers," another man can be heard saying as passengers start to boo. "Screw this airline," a man says. 
The incident happened as passengers were boarding a flight at Phoenix, on their way to Portland. 
Fough was flown on the next flight to Portland at no charge. 
The footage was taken on a mobile phone by passenger Bill Byrne who was seated right behind Fough.
